cinimaticCaption.caption: FORGE: Let's just take one last look-see...
ARBITER: The Hierarchs grow impatient! We can delay no longer!
ELITE: What if the infection defiles the relic?
ARBITER: I care not for your little life - open the relic.
FORGE: Well, well -
open sesame...
SPIRIT OF FIRE OBSERVATION DECK
CUTTER: What made you choose my observation deck as your lab, Professor?
ANDERS: I like the view. It adds...perspective to my work.
CUTTER: Forge doesn't think it's safe for you to go down there yet.
He's quite insistent.
ANDERS: I can be quite insistent too, Captain. I can take care of myself.
CUTTER: Any idea what it is we've got down there?
ANDERS: It's all theories right now,
and I'll know a lot more once I get down there.
CUTTER: I'm approving the mission, but the slightest sign of danger
and I'm pulling you out. Is that understood?
ANDERS: Understood, Captain.
ARBITER: Hierarch. The humans are closing and will soon be upon us!
REGRET: No matter.
The information you have gathered here is most appetizing.
However, we must protect what we have learned here.
Set the charges and destroy this place.
ARBITER: Destroy this holy relic? Surely you jest!
REGRET: The Journey requires sacrifice!
Set the charges. Return to us!
Our patience is not infinite!
ARBITER: It will be done.
